page.title: 12Education
page.content: There are five primary schools in Rainford and one High School.The primary schools are Brook Lodge C.P., Bushey Lane C.E.,Corpus Christi R.C., Rainford C.E. Infants and Rainford C.E. Juniors.The High School is called Rainford High.This school which is an 11-18 mixed comprehensive caters for about 1200 pupils.The children from the county and Church of England schools transfer to Rainford High at the age of 11. The children from Corpus Christi transfer to Catholic High Schools in St.Helens.The boys attend West Park High School and the girls attend Notre Dame High School.Both these Schools are 11-18 single sex comprehensives.
